settings.title: Welcome to the club, [name]!
settings.description: You'll love getting there even more when you earn points & collect members-only rewards every time you shop.

settings.title: Join the Club!
settings.description: As a valued member, you'll instantly get $5 just for signing up, plus you'll earn points & get exclusive rewards every time you shop.

settings.title: Stay Connected
settings.text: Join our private Facebook group - CALPAK Lounge. A place where our community can connect together and discuss travel inspiration, tips, guides, and so much more!

settings.title: What’s a VIT?
settings.answer: VIT stands for Very Important Traveler. When you join our exclusive VIT Rewards Program, we reward you for traveling and spreading the word about CALPAK along the way.

settings.title: What do I get for joining?
settings.answer:
We're glad you asked! First of all, you get $5 *just* for signing up—need we say more? Depending on your VIT tier, you will receive different perks and rewards. 

Regardless of which tier you fall into, you will get the following perks:

  • Be the first to know about all our future sales and promotions
  • Earn points for every dollar spent
  • A very special birthday gift
  • An anniversary gift
  • Receive $25 worth of VIT points every time you successfully refer a friend.

*Please note: VIT points can not be earned when purchasing a CALPAK gift card.

Why not earn while you travel the world?

settings.title: What is the difference between VIT tiers?
settings.answer: We have three different VIT tiers: Explorer, Voyager, and Jetsetter. Click this link here to be redirected to our VIT homepage. From there, you can see the different tiers and all the exciting perks and rewards associated with each one.

settings.title: Can I combine my offers?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, you can’t use a promo code and your reward points at the same time. But, good news! You can combine all of your reward points and use them at once—so start saving those points ASAP!

settings.title: Do points expire?
settings.answer: Your points expire after 2 years after once they're earned leaving you ample time to use your points!

settings.title: Where do I check how many points I have?
settings.answer: It’s easy—just log into your account and go to the rewards tab. You have to be signed in if you want to redeem your points.

settings.title: How many points can I use on my order?
settings.answer: You can use as many points as you'd like! Please note, VIT points cannot be used to redeem shipping costs. If your order total goes below our threshold for free standard shipping, you will be charged our shipping fee.

settings.title: Can I use my VIT points when checking out on my phone?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Be sure to log into your VIT account before checking out. At any point during the checkout process, you can click the “show order summary” dropdown at the top of the page. From there, you will see the sliding scale for you to add your VIT points to your order. For further assistance, please reach out to help@calpaks.com.

settings.title: Why aren’t my points showing up?
settings.answer:
It takes up to 24 hours for your points to show up. Didn’t get a confirmation email from us? Try checking your spam.

*Please note birthdays must be shared 30 days prior to the date. If your birthday falls within the next 30 days, please reach out to our customer service team at help@calpaks.com, and we're happy to help you add your birthday to our system!

settings.title: What makes a successful referral?
settings.answer: When whoever you refer to CALPAK makes a purchase of $150 or more, you’ll get a $25 credit. Please note that it may take some time to show up in your rewards account. If it’s been over 24 hours, then contact us. There’s no limit to how many people you refer, so keep spreading the word and earning credit!

settings.title: What if I forgot my password?
settings.answer: Oh no! We can help with that. Head over to the account page and hit 'forgot password.” Enter your email and you’ll receive an email shortly after to update your password.

settings.title: I don’t live in the US but I want to be a VIT. What should I do?
settings.answer: We’d love for everyone to be a VIT! Unfortunately, we aren’t shipping out of the continental US at this time. Hopefully this will change soon.
